The Bone Snatcher is about a group miners who go on a search for a missing crew of miners in the Namib Desert. When the find them, they do not realize that what was going on with them. Just then, an enemy of theirs discover the bodies and group mines there. So they come to stop their mining activity.

Snow White is in my opinion a bad movie on an artistic point of view. The plot is pretty much foreseeable, the characters are stereotypes, the editing too. But a quite decent film production by EA Games on the whole, thanks to a story of known quality. Film music is beautiful,, or at least it is professional presentation. Few good words for this film, I just can't think right now.
